actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials

official_title: To eliminate the exemption for the payment by Amtrak of certain costs relating to pedestrian bridges over Amtrak rights-of-way.

summary.text: Amends Federal transportation law to eliminate the exemption for the payment by Amtrak of certain costs relating to pedestrian bridges which cross over rights-of-way owned by it.

titles.title: To eliminate the exemption for the payment by Amtrak of certain costs relating to pedestrian bridges over Amtrak rights-of-way.
